Sad to think all these guys are dead. I wonder what they achieved in their lives.
Lovely historical shot.

comment._content: Indeed, wonder how many went on to science as a career.

comment.author: 23885771@N03
comment._content:
How strange - notice that all the labelled chemical bottles are empty !!
Wonder could this be a promotional photograph of their new chemistry laboratory- probably taken even before the first chemistry practical class? Obviously the lads are posing with no experiment to be performed.
Stuart.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: You could be right, Stu. Watepark College was only 8 years old when this photo was taken: www.waterparkcollege.com/
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
